5.title: Provo, Utah - Wikipedia
5.description: Provo ( / ˈproʊvoʊ / PROH-voh) is a city in and the county seat of Utah County, Utah, United States. It is 43 miles (69 km) south of Salt Lake City along the Wasatch Front, and lies between the cities of Orem to the north and Springville to the south. With a population at the 2020 census of 115,162, [3] Provo is the fourth-largest city in Utah and the principal city in the Provo-Orem ...

6.title: Utah County, Utah - Wikipedia
6.description: Utah County is the second-most populous county in the U.S. state of Utah. The county seat and largest city is Provo, [1] which is the stateundefineds fourth-largest city, and the largest outside of Salt Lake County. As of the 2020 United States Census, the population was 665,665. [2]

7.description: Clerk: Elections Responsible for conducting elections in Utah county for all Federal, State, and Municipal races.
